teaser: Linnette Lopez of Business Insider and Ben Walsh of Reuters discuss the news.
title: Weekend Brunch: Health care, global income inequality, and how to dress well
contentencoded:
Linette Lopez, Wall Street editor for Business Insider, and Ben Walsh, online editor for Reuters, discuss the week's news and what's on their plate in the upcoming week. 

Get prepped for your own brunch:

Reuters: Obamacare's circuitious path

New York Times/The Upshot: Income Inequality Is Not Rising Globally. It's Falling.

Business Insider: 18 Things Every Man Should Take Out Of His Closet And Burn
